languages.text: "Конечно. Моему шедевру требовалась немыслимая энергия, но разве такая мелочь, как немыслимое, может стоять у меня на пути? Звезда, которую вы зовете Райкад, была украдена по моему повелению, как и многие до и после нее".

"Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."
languages.original_text: "Конечно. Моему шедевру требовалась немыслимая энергия, но разве такая мелочь, как немыслимое, может стоять у меня на пути? Звезда, которую вы зовете Райкад, была украдена по моему повелению, как и многие до и после нее".

traits.locale_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

"Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

"Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

"Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

"Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

languages.text: 「もちろんだ。傑作には想像を絶する量のエネルギーが必要だった。だが、『想像を絶する』程度のこは妨げとはならんのだよ。お前たちがライカドと呼ぶ星は、俺の命令で盗まれたものだ。それ以前の数多の星と同様にな」
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: 「もちろんだ。傑作には想像を絶する量のエネルギーが必要だった。だが、『想像を絶する』程度のこは妨げとはならんのだよ。お前たちがライカドと呼ぶ星は、俺の命令で盗まれたものだ。それ以前の数多の星と同様にな」

languages.text: “当然了，我的杰作需要无法想象的庞大能量，但我怎么能让‘无法想象’这种微不足道的事情阻挡我的道路？你们称之为‘莱卡德’的那颗恒星，就是我下令偷走的，和之前的许多恒星一样。”
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: “当然了，我的杰作需要无法想象的庞大能量，但我怎么能让‘无法想象’这种微不足道的事情阻挡我的道路？你们称之为‘莱卡德’的那颗恒星，就是我下令偷走的，和之前的许多恒星一样。”

languages.text: « Bien sûr. Mon chef-d'œuvre nécessitait une quantité incommensurable d'énergie, mais comment pouvais-je laisser quelque chose d'aussi futile que "l'impensable" me faire obstacle ? L'étoile que vous appelez Rykad a été volée à ma demande, comme bien d'autres avant elle. »
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: « Bien sûr. Mon chef-d'œuvre nécessitait une quantité incommensurable d'énergie, mais comment pouvais-je laisser quelque chose d'aussi futile que "l'impensable" me faire obstacle ? L'étoile que vous appelez Rykad a été volée à ma demande, comme bien d'autres avant elle. »

languages.text: «Por supuesto. Para mi arma necesitaba una cantidad impensable de energía, pero ¿acaso iba a dejar que lo "impensable" se interpusiera en mi camino? La estrella a la que llamáis Rykad fue robada por orden mía, al igual que muchas otras antes».
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: «Por supuesto. Para mi arma necesitaba una cantidad impensable de energía, pero ¿acaso iba a dejar que lo "impensable" se interpusiera en mi camino? La estrella a la que llamáis Rykad fue robada por orden mía, al igual que muchas otras antes».

languages.text: "Natürlich. Mein Meisterstück brauchte eine unvorstellbare Menge an Energie, aber wie konnte ich zulassen, dass mir etwas so Banales wie 'das Undenkbare' im Weg steht? Der Stern, den Ihr Rykad nennt, wurde wie viele andere vor ihm auf mein Geheiß gestohlen."
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: "Natürlich. Mein Meisterstück brauchte eine unvorstellbare Menge an Energie, aber wie konnte ich zulassen, dass mir etwas so Banales wie 'das Undenkbare' im Weg steht? Der Stern, den Ihr Rykad nennt, wurde wie viele andere vor ihm auf mein Geheiß gestohlen."

languages.text: "Elbette. Başyapıtım, akıl almaz ölçülerde enerjiye ihtiyaç duyuyordu. 'Akıl almaz' olacak kadar önemsiz bir şeyin beni engellemesine nasıl izin verirdim? Rykad adıyla bildiğin yıldız, benim buyruğumla çalındı. Tıpkı onun öncesinde çalınan birçok güneş gibi."
languages.original_text: "Of course. My masterpiece needed an unthinkable amount of energy, but how could I let something as trifling as 'the unthinkable' stand in my way? The star you call Rykad was stolen at my behest, as were many before it."

traits.locale_text: "Elbette. Başyapıtım, akıl almaz ölçülerde enerjiye ihtiyaç duyuyordu ama 'akıl almaz' gibi önemsiz bir şeyin beni engellemesine nasıl izin verirdim? Rykad adıyla bildiğin yıldız benim buyruğumla çalındı. Tıpkı onun öncesinde çalınan birçok güneş gibi."
